name: Coordstagram
description: View Instagrams taken near a specified latitude and longitude

scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rake db:migrate && bundle exec rake initial_backfill

LATITUDE.description: Latitude of coordinates you want to fetch Instagrams from. Find coordinates at Google Maps or latlong.net

LONGITUDE.description: Longitude of coordinates you want to fetch Instagrams from

MAX_DISTANCE_IN_METERS.description: Search radius from coordinates, in meters. Must be between 1 and 5000

INSTAGRAM_CLIENT_ID.description: Register your application at http://instagram.com/developer and get a Client ID

NAME_OF_SITE.description: What do you want to call your site?

PAGES_TO_FETCH_FOR_INITIAL_BACKFILL.description: How many pages of Instagram items to fetch after deploy? There are 20 photos/videos per page of Instagram items
